throw.title: Throw Oppty missing in VForce Fault

parameter.name: reason
parameter.expression: fn:concat(fn:concat('Opportunity ', $input.in_opportunity_id), ' does not exist in VForce')

operation.expression: for $itm at $cntr in $input.VF_OpportunityProductDetails let $catg:="SCN1" return if($itm/ProductCode != '' and $itm/Prod_Service__c != 'Advisory & Transaction Support') then ( <Item actionCode="01"> <ServiceContractItem>{fn:concat($cntr,'00')}</ServiceContractItem> <ServiceContractItemCategory>{$temp.tmp_ServiceContractItemCategory/text()} </ServiceContractItemCategory> <yy1:YY1_ExecutionCountry xmlns:yy1="http://SAPCustomFields.com/YY1_">{$itm/CountryIsoCode__c/text()} </yy1:YY1_ExecutionCountry> <Product>{util:iif($itm/ProductCode='', $itm/ProductCode/text(), fn:concat(fn:replace($itm/ProductCode/text(), '-', ''),'C'))}</Product> {if($itm/Frequency__c = 'ZPS1') then ( <Quantity unitCode="C62"> {util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Quantity), $itm/Quantity, fn:round($itm/Quantity/number(), 3))}</Quantity> ) else ( <Quantity unitCode="EA"> {util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Quantity), $itm/Quantity, fn:round($itm/Quantity/number(), 3))}</Quantity> )} { if($catg='SCN1' and not(util:isNull($itm/Net_Unit_Price__c) or $itm/Net_Unit_Price__c <= 0)) then (<PriceComponent actionCode="01"> <ConditionType>{$itm/Frequency__c/text()}</ConditionType> <ConditionRateValue>{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Net_Unit_Price__c), $itm/Net_Unit_Price__c, fn:round($itm/Net_Unit_Price__c/number(), 2))}</ConditionRateValue> <ConditionCurrency>{$itm/Billing_Currency__c/text()}</ConditionCurrency> {if($itm/Frequency__c = 'ZPS1') then ( <ConditionQuantity unitCode="C62">{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c), $itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c, fn:round($itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c/number(),0))}</ConditionQuantity> ) else ( <ConditionQuantity unitCode="EA">{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c), $itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c, fn:round($itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c/number(),0))}</ConditionQuantity>)} </PriceComponent> ) else () } <TextCollection> <Text actionCode="01"> <TypeCode>{$temp.tmp_Item_TypeCode/text()}</TypeCode> <ContentText languageCode="EN">{$itm/Description/text()}</ContentText> </Text> </TextCollection> <ServiceContrItemStartDateTime>{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Operational_Start_Date__c),$itm/Operational_Start_Date__c,fn:concat($itm/Operational_Start_Date__c/text(),'T00:00:00'))}</ServiceContrItemStartDateTime> <ServiceContrItemEndDateTime>{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Service_End_Date__c),$itm/Service_End_Date__c,fn:concat($itm/Service_End_Date__c/text(),'T00:00:00'))} </ServiceContrItemEndDateTime> <SettlementPeriodRule>{$itm/Billing_Frequency__c/text()}</SettlementPeriodRule> <BillingPlanBillingDateRule>{$itm/Billing_Plan_Billing_Date_Rule/text()}</BillingPlanBillingDateRule> {util:iif($catg='SCN2', <PriceAdaptationEntry> <SettlementStartDateTime/> <SettlementEndDateTime/> <ConditionType/> <ConditionRateValue/> <ConditionCurrency/> </PriceAdaptationEntry> ,'')} <ReferenceServiceContractItem>{fn:concat($cntr,'00')}</ReferenceServiceContractItem> <ServiceContractObjectList actionCode="01"> <Product>{util:iif($itm/ProductCode='', $itm/ProductCode/text(),fn:concat(fn:replace($itm/ProductCode/text(), '-', ''),'P'))} </Product> </ServiceContractObjectList> </Item> ) else ()

for $itm in $temp.tmp_Opportunity_Lineitem let $catg:="SCN1" return <Item actionCode="01"> <ServiceContractItem>{$temp.tmp_Max_SCItem_ID/text()}</ServiceContractItem> <ServiceContractItemCategory>{$temp.tmp_ServiceContractItemCategory/text()} </ServiceContractItemCategory> <yy1:YY1_ExecutionCountry xmlns:yy1="http://SAPCustomFields.com/YY1_">{$itm/CountryIsoCode__c/text()} </yy1:YY1_ExecutionCountry> <Product>{util:iif($itm/ProductCode='', $itm/ProductCode/text(), fn:concat(fn:replace($itm/ProductCode/text(), '-', ''),'C'))}</Product> { if($itm/Frequency__c = 'ZPS1') then ( <Quantity unitCode="C62">{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Quantity), $itm/Quantity, fn:round($itm/Quantity/number(), 3))}</Quantity> ) else ( <Quantity unitCode="EA"> {util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Quantity), $itm/Quantity, fn:round($itm/Quantity/number(), 3))}</Quantity>)} { if($catg='SCN1' and not(util:isNull($itm/Net_Unit_Price__c) or $itm/Net_Unit_Price__c <= 0)) then (<PriceComponent actionCode="01"> <ConditionType>{$itm/Frequency__c/text()}</ConditionType> <ConditionRateValue>{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Net_Unit_Price__c), $itm/Net_Unit_Price__c, fn:round($itm/Net_Unit_Price__c/number(), 2))} </ConditionRateValue> <ConditionCurrency>{$itm/Billing_Currency__c/text()}</ConditionCurrency> {if($itm/Frequency__c = 'ZPS1') then ( <ConditionQuantity unitCode="C62">{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c), $itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c, fn:round($itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c/number(),0))}</ConditionQuantity> ) else ( <ConditionQuantity unitCode="EA">{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c), $itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c, fn:round($itm/SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c/number(),0))}</ConditionQuantity> )} </PriceComponent> ) else () } <TextCollection> <Text actionCode="01"> <TypeCode>{$temp.tmp_Item_TypeCode/text()}</TypeCode> <ContentText languageCode="EN">{$itm/Description/text()}</ContentText> </Text> </TextCollection> <ServiceContrItemStartDateTime>{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Operational_Start_Date__c),$itm/Operational_Start_Date__c,fn:concat($itm/Operational_Start_Date__c/text(),'T00:00:00'))}</ServiceContrItemStartDateTime> <ServiceContrItemEndDateTime>{util:iif(util:isNull($itm/Service_End_Date__c),$itm/Service_End_Date__c,fn:concat($itm/Service_End_Date__c/text(),'T00:00:00'))} </ServiceContrItemEndDateTime> <SettlementPeriodRule>{$itm/Billing_Frequency__c/text()}</SettlementPeriodRule> <BillingPlanBillingDateRule>{$itm/Billing_Plan_Billing_Date_Rule/text()} </BillingPlanBillingDateRule> {util:iif($catg='SCN2', <PriceAdaptationEntry> <SettlementStartDateTime/> <SettlementEndDateTime/> <ConditionType/> <ConditionRateValue/> <ConditionCurrency/> </PriceAdaptationEntry> ,'')} <ReferenceServiceContractItem>{$temp.tmp_Max_SCItem_ID/text()}</ReferenceServiceContractItem> <ServiceContractObjectList actionCode="01"> <Product>{util:iif($itm/ProductCode='', $itm/ProductCode/text(),fn:concat(fn:replace($itm/ProductCode/text(), '-', ''),'P'))} </Product> </ServiceContractObjectList> </Item>

assignment.title: Skip Current and Iterate to next Product

operation.expression:
fn:concat('Hi User,','
','
', 'Please find below the Advisory Product(s) for Opportunity ', $input.in_opportunity_id, '.
','
', fn:replace($temp.tmp_AdvisoryProduct_List, ';', '
'), '
','
', '
', 'Thanks','
', '--Vistra IICS Support Team','
','
', '--This is system generated email , please do not reply.' )
